488120.name: Blast-off Original Soundtrack
488120.description:
Listen anywhere

Complete Blast-off original soundtrack in loseless FLAC format. Listen anywhere this DRM-free tracks.

Enchance the game

After install of this DLC the game will star play FLAC tracks instead of ogg version.

Composed and performed by Egor Fedotov

List of tracks:
  • Main Menu - 2:37
  • Maps - 1:49
  • Transition - 2:58
  • Meteor Shower - 2:35
  • A New World on the Edge of the Universe - 4:08
  • Flight - 3:30
  • Microcosmos - 2:26
  • World's Border - 3:15
  • Pioneers - 3:02
  • Trailer Music - 2:19
  • Through the Space - 3:22

And BONUS tracks
  • World's Border (guitar cover) - 3:15
  • Secret Level - 2:27
